nodes.text: Atzerri was a Gotal colony world in the galaxy's Inner Rim, located in grid square M-13 on the Standard Galactic Grid. In the year 22 BBY, tens of millions of Gotal refugees fled to Atzerri when their homeworld of Antar 4 fell to the Confederacy of Independent Systems shortly after the First Battle of Geonosis, the first battle of the Clone Wars.
